H0.text: Sensory is the division of the peripheral nervous system that interprets signals, while the motor division sends signals.

H1.text: Kinetic is the division of the peripheral nervous system that interprets signals, while the motor division sends signals.

H2.text: Olfactory is the division of the peripheral nervous system that interprets signals, while the motor division sends signals.

H3.text: Automatic is the division of the peripheral nervous system that interprets signals, while the motor division sends signals.

A4.text: The peripheral mechanisms involve olfactory receptor neurons which transduce a chemical signal along the olfactory nerve, which terminates in the olfactory bulb.
